faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions about Anime Rangers X? We've got answers.

items.title: What are the best DPS units in Anime Rangers X?
items.description: Currently, the best DPS units are Soul King, Vampire Emperor (Heaven), Priest of Heaven, Shadowborne, Crimson Owl, Blood Queen, The Almighty, Cursed Love, Solar Fist, Bunny (Full Moon), and Shin (Reverse).

items.title: How do you get Secret and Ranger units?
items.description: You can get Secret and Ranger units by completing Ranger Stages, from limited Boss Battle events, Tournaments, Portals, by opening Event Capsules, and by being in the AFK lobby.

items.title: What are the best Mythic units?
items.description: The best mythic ARX units are Golden Will (Requiem), Knight King (Chaos), Erase King (Requiem), Blood Scythe, and Feral Fang.

items.title: Which units are best for beginners?
items.description: The best beginner Legendary units are Otaku, Silent Sting, Doctor Pirate, Shadow Reaver, and Light Admiral. The best epic units are Cyborg, Demon Slayer, and Hero on Wheels.

items.title: How often is the tier list updated?
items.description: Our tier list is updated regularly with each major game update, including balance changes, new unit releases, and meta shifts. We test all units in current endgame content to ensure accurate rankings.

items.title: What criteria do you use for ranking units?
items.description: Units are ranked based on HP, DPS (Damage/Cooldown), Range, Speed, Ability Damage, Upgrade costs, and Passives. We test units in Story, Boss, Portal, and Raid stages at maximum level without traits.
